programme.desc: Ruby and Zokie decide to care for Brox's shed skin in 'A Brox Tale', then in 'The Motherloaf', Ruby and Zokie's messiness creates an insatiable dough-monster who feeds on their messes. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes she lived in a luxury hotel in 'Wellsington Hotellsington', then in '1500 Minutes of Fame', Hazel wishes she was famous at school. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Return of Thornbergaupht: Simon's interactive video game is about to take off, until Jeanette reprograms the game's villain. (S5, ep 10a)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Squashed: When Alvin dreams of joining a private club, he volunteers Dave to play squash, even though Dave doesn't play. (S5, ep 10b)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Writer's Block: When Dave suffers from writer's block, Alvin pretends to write a broadway show, which only makes Dave feel worse. (S5, ep 11a)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Jinxed!: After Theodore sees Alvin accidentally ruin Dave's computer, Alvin jinxes Theodore so he won't be able to tell on him. (S5, ep 11b)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob must figure out how to do his job after shrinking himself in 'The Incredible Shrinking SpongeBob', then in 'Sportz?', Squidward invents a new sport to get back at SpongeBob and Patrick.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob mistakes an escaped convict for his driving instructor in 'The Getaway', then in 'Lost and Found', when Mr. Krabs sends him searching for a missing toy, SpongeBob finds himself lost too!

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: There's no ARRGH in "Team": Sonic and the crew of the Angel's Voyage aren't the only ones after the No Place Shard. The Chaos Council co-opted Nine's Shatterdrive tech and want it back too! (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Avoid the Void: In The Void, Shadow intercepts Sonic's latest Shatterspace transverse, for a personal face-to-fist encounter. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The Parent Zap: After Phoebe and Max let Chloe's friends watch a horror movie and eat sweets, Jinx and Booch's parents want to meet Chloe's. So Max and Phoebe transform into Hank and Barb. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Save The Date: Max bets Phoebe she can't turn off being a superhero and go on a normal date. Chloe helps Phoebe do well on the date, but Max tries to sabotage it by crying wolf. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Toon In For Danger: When Henry and Ray get a copy of the new Kid Danger & Captain Man cartoon and see that it's horrible, they must hurry to fix the cartoon before the big premiere party. (S4, ep 11)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Car Trek: Charlotte's birthday road trip to see the Boo Man Group perform gets sidetracked by a Captain Man and Kid Danger emergency. (S4, ep 12)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob & Patrick's Timeline Twist-up: When Patrick's Time Closet goes wrong, SpongeBob's history is re-written by time traveling interlopers. (S16, ep 14)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin suspects his neighbour is responsible for a recent heist in 'What A Gem', and in 'Family Spirit', Alvin tries to get out of the family picnic with Dave to go to a soccer game. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin catches Simon taking a test to discover his soul-mate in 'Albrittina', then in 'Simon for President', Simon and Alvin decide to launch their own campaigns for class president. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Clumsy and Dimwitty want to help cure 'Rowena's Plant', then in 'What a Doll', Rowena decides to turn Vanity and Storm into dolls to play with. (S3, ep 4)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Scaredy Smurf would like a dragon in 'I Want a Dragon', then in 'Magic Meltdown', an abandoned cauldron takes revenge. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Save Royal Woods!: When Royal Woods is in danger of being flooded to make room for a sixth Great Lake, the town comes together to prove that they're worth saving. (S6, ep 4)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln seeks a better seat in class in 'Musical Chairs', then in 'The Taunting Hour', Lynn gets heckled at her soccer game, and the Louds realize they all have critics. (S6, ep 5)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Gary is hoping to enjoy some tasty snail snacks that SpongeBob has brought home in 'Treats!', and then in 'For Here Or To Go?', Plankton wins a free Krabby Patty, but Mr Krabs won't hand it over.

programme.title: Dora and the Search For Sol Dorado
programme.desc: Dora, Diego, and Boots join Naiya and Sonny on an adventure to find Sol Dorado, an Incan treasure. They will have to navigate a jungle, puzzles, and booby traps to keep Sol Dorado out of enemy hands.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Save The Date: Max bets Phoebe she can't turn off being a superhero and go on a normal date. Chloe helps Phoebe do well on the date, but Max tries to sabotage it by crying wolf. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Cherry Bad Things: Cherry visits, and the Thundermans discover she still has her superpowers. Cherry promises to remove them after her day with Phoebe and Chloe, but there's a problem. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Love Bytes: Things get a little buggy when Schwoz installs a new operating system on the Man Cave Computer designed to detect and eliminate threats all over Swellview. (S5, ep 18)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Double-O Danger: Kid Danger and Captain Man attempt to capture Mob Boss Rob Moss by infiltrating his daughter's sweet sixteen birthday party. (S5, ep 19)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: The Bird Scene: Tori tries to master an iconic Hollywood Arts monologue in Sikowitz's class. Andre and Robbie join a ballet class hoping to meet girls, with disastrous results. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Teamwork Makes The Scene Work: Will being an actor make you popular? When the drama teacher announces the best actor in their class will get to perform at assembly, Lydia is thrilled. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Villains' Night: Danger Force and Captain Man go undercover as bad guys to catch a criminal. If their cover is blown, they'll have to fight all of Swellview's toughest villains at once! (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Mime Games: When Danger Force are called to Paris to protect France's national treasures, Bose is accidentally left alone to try and stop The Toddler from breaking into The Man's Nest. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Nothing to Lose Sleepover: Phoebe hosts her first sleepover and is caught using telekinesis to make it fun. She must wear an anklet that prevents her from using her powers. (S1, ep 17)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Pretty Little Choirs: When a mean girl sabotages Phoebe in choir and takes advantage of Max by making him do her homework for her, the twins work together to get even with her. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Mo' Danger, Mo' Problems: As Henry tries to adjust to his new role as Kid Danger, he struggles to balance his schedule between crime fighting, school, family and friends. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: The Secret Gets Out: Henry's life as Kid Danger is threatened when Charlotte gets increasingly suspicious about the secrets he's been hiding. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Who's That Girl?: The gang comes across a glamorous girl with a vintage spy camera and no memory. Is she a spy? With Raquel sniffing around, the team tries to help the mysterious girl. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Distress Call: When Taylor and the gang hear a radio distress call coming from themselves, from the future. They race to find the source of the message. Ellis thinks he has time-travelled. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Yng nghanol y goedwig, allwch chi glywed yr holl synau gwahanol? Ma Harmoni, Melodi a Bop eisiau gwybod pwy sy'n swnio fel ffliwt. Harmoni, Melodi and Bop wonder who makes a hooting sound.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach
programme.desc: Cyfle i ddarganfod y pethau cryf a chlyfar sy'n rhan o fyd natur, fel, metelau, deimwntau, y planhigyn Fagl Gwener a dwr. We learn how water can alter the shape of the landscape.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon, coesau yw'r thema a cawn gipolwg ar yr octopws, y neidr gantroed a'r tarantiwla. The theme this time is legs and we meet the octopus, the centipede and the tarantula.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd Caradog y ceiliog a Marged a'i chwningen. Today we meet Caradog the cockerel and Marged and her rabbit.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Blero a'i ffrindiau'n mynd i'r ffair, ond mae 'na broblem fawr yn codi pan gaiff y crebachwr ei ddefnyddio. Blero goes to the funfair but the shrinkasizer creates a huge mess!

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Wedi i Guto, Benja a Lili gael eu hudo gan lwyth o radish blasus yr olwg, mae Lili'n cael ei dal yn nhrap Mr Cadno. Lili finds herself caught in Mr Cadno's trap. Can Guto rescue her?

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Heddiw mae Help Llaw wedi creu gm anhygoel newydd! Ond gyda Twm a Mai-Mai yn gyfartal, pwy sy'n mynd i ennill? Help Llaw has created a spectacular new game! But who will be the winner?

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Gari'n poeni bod llygoden yn yr ysgol ond yn methu ei ddal, ac mae Miss Enfys wedi drysu ei diwrnodau. Gary's worried there's a mouse in the school but he can't catch it!

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Wedi i'r Jetlu fethu sylwi ar gynllun dieflig yn yr amgueddfa, mae Crwbi'n camu i'r adwy er mwyn achub y dydd! After the Jetlu failed to spot a vicious plan in the museum, Crwbi steps in!

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Ln Las sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Ln Las join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: New: Stwnsh Sadwrn Byw
programme.desc: Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed a Cadi sy' yn y stiwdio, gyda llond lle o gemau, LOL-ian ac ambell pei Stwnsh! Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed and Cadi are in the studio with games and the odd Stwnsh pie!

programme.title: Jambori Ewro Menywod Cymru 2025

programme.title: Y Smyrffs

programme.title: Chwarter Call
programme.desc: Ymunwch Cadi, Luke, Jed a Miriam yn y gyfres gomedi Chwarter Call. Join Cadi, Luke, Jed and Miriam in the comedy series Chwarter Call - with the Oddams, Seren Sassy and Bari Bargen!

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae Harri'n cael galwad gan Matilda yng ngorsaf yr heddlu - mae 'na broblem cwpwrdd-styc! Harri gets a call from Matilda at the police station - there's a problem with a stuck cupboard! [SL]

programme.desc: Y tro hwn: teyrnged i'r cyfeilydd, detholiad o ddeuawdau, ynghyd dathliad o gantorion mwyaf adnabyddus Cymru. A tribute to the accompanist, the duet and Wales' leading singers.

programme.title: Arctig Gwyllt Iolo Williams
programme.desc: Yn rhaglen ola'r gyfres gwelwn ryfeddodau naturiol y llosgfynyddoedd tanllyd a ffenomena unigryw Golau'r Gogledd. Last in the series looking at the challenges for nature in the Nordic wild.

programme.title: Ar Led
programme.desc: Mae Daf yn rhannu ei brofiad am 'kinks' yn y lofft, a Beth yn siarad am heintiau a drosglwyddir drwy ryw a'r profion sydd ar gael. Daf talks about kinks, and Beth chats STIs and tests.

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Pan mae Pili Po yn llwyddo mewn prawf, mae'r Tm yn tefnu dathliad. When Pili-Po passes an important test, the team organise a po-fect celebration.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi, celf a chn i blant 4-7 mlwydd oed lle mae Aeron Pugh fel y cymeriad Bendant yn ymuno dosbarthiadau plant ledled Cymru. Comedy, art and singing series for children aged 4-7.

programme.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Og a'i ffrindiau heddiw? What's happening in the world of Og and friends today?

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Mae olion deinosor mwya'r byd wedi cael ei ddarganfod ym Mhatagonia ac ar hyn o bryd yn cael ei arddangos yn Llundain. Elin and Marian tell the story of the world's largest dinosaur remains.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Sam a Sin yn byrddio'r Macrell Frithog i chwilio am gorgimychiaid ond mae'r pysgota'n mynd ar chwl gyda'r tywydd! Sam Spratt takes Sin out on the Merry Mackerel to catch prawns!

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Mae Ceris yn gofyn 'Pam bod y byd yn grwn?' ac mae Tad-cu'n ateb gyda stori dwl a doniol am ddau frawd. This time Ceris asks 'Why is the world round?' and Tad-cu spins one of his tall tales.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Cochyn yn chwarae gm newydd mae wedi ei chreu ac mae Digbi'n awyddus iawn i greu gm newydd hefyd. Cochyn is playing a new game he's invented. Digbi wishes he could invent a game too.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw yn cwrdd a theulu sy'n mwynhau dringo, a bydd rhai o ddisgyblion Ysgol Bro Teyrnon yn gwneud ioga. Today: Meleri will be cycling with Elis on the pump track, plus more.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Tra'n yr archfarchnad heddiw nid yw Pablo'n gallu penderfynu pa fath o basta mae eisiau i de. Ond mae'n rhaid iddo ddewis un ohonynt. Pablo can't decide what type of pasta to have for tea.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Mae peintiwr tirwedd adnabyddus wedi dewis y dyffryn a'r rheilffordd fel pwnc ar gyfer ei gwaith nesaf, ac mae angen help mawr gan y dreigiau! This time, the dragons help a renowned painter!

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod ffair yng Nghwmtwrch ac maepawb, ar wahn i Lisa Ln, yn edrych mlaen i fynd ar yr olwyn fawr. It's Cwmtwrch fair day - but Lisa Ln isn't looking forward to the big wheel!

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus yn llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddynt chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai on a playful adventure full of dance and music.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan mae "Capten" Gwich yn gwahodd ei ffrindiau ar ei gwch mae'n mynnu taw fe yw'r bos - ond mae'n dysgu gwers bwysig. Ratty takes his friends on a boat trip and learns an important lesson.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Tydi Deian a Loli ddim yn hapus gan bod anifeiliad gwyllt yn dwyn eu llysiau yn y Rhandir heddiw! Deian and Loli aren't happy because animals are stealing their allotment vegetables!

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Cyfle i edych 'nl dros rai o gyfarchion pen-blwydd yr wythnos. A look back at some of this week's birthday greetings.

programme.title: Y 'Sgubor Flodau
programme.desc: Tro hwn, mae aelodau ac arweinwyr Cr Arwyddo Lleisiau Llawen Caernarfon am ddiolch i'w harweinydd am sefydlu'r cr. This time: a floral thanks to the founder of Cr Arwyddo Lleisiau Llawen.

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Yn Lluarth yr Onnen, Adam sy'n taclo jobsus tymhorol, tra bo Sioned yn picio i feithrinfa Claire Austin yn y Drenewydd. Meinir builds a water feature suitable for any garden, large or small.

programme.title: Cynefin
programme.desc: Bydd Heledd Cynwal, Iestyn Jones a Sin Tomos Owen yn crwydro o amgylch Dyffryn Nantlle y tro hwn. We're in Dyffryn Nantlle this time to hear more about the slate industry and local stories.

programme.title: Taith Bywyd
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, y cyn AS, Sian James, sydd ar daith bywyd - clywn am ei rol blaenllaw yn Streic y Glowyr. This time, with ex member of parliament, Sian James, whose story featured in 'Pride'.

programme.title: Gronyn Gobaith: Cymry CERN
programme.desc: Stori ryfeddol arbrawf mwya'r byd yn CERN, lle mae ffisegwyr o Gymru yn allweddol. The remarkable story of the biggest physics experiment in the world, where Welsh scientists are key.

programme.title: Ffermio
programme.desc: Mae Meinir yn nigwyddiad cneifio elusennol yn Ystd Cnewr, ac mae Nia yn ymchwilio i reolau newydd Llywodraeth Cymru ar y tafod glas. Alun meets someone who records life in the countryside.

programme.title: SEICLO: Tour de France 2025
programme.desc: Cymal 2 - Y puncheurs ac arbenigwyr y dihangiad sy'n debyg o fynnu wrth i'r peloton frwydro dringfeydd ar arfordir garw gogledd Ffrainc. TDF's Stage 2 - on France's rugged northern coast.

programme.title: Darn Bach o Hanes
programme.desc: Bydd Dewi Prysor yn olrhain y cysylltiad Cymreig yn hanes recordio cerddoriaeth. Dewi looks at the Welsh connection in the history of recorded music.

programme.title: NSW Waratahs v Y Llewod
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau gm NSW Waratahs v Y Llewod Prydeinig a Gwyddelig, a chwaraewyd heddiw yn Stadiwm Allianz. Highlights of the NSW Waratahs v The British & Irish Lions game played earlier today.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Rhifyn omnibws yn edrych nl ar ddigwyddiadau yng Nghwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Hafiach
programme.desc: Wedi datganiad yr heddlu gadarnhau be ddigwyddodd i'r corff ma'r criw'n amau rhan Aabis ym mhopeth. Following the police statement the gang begin to question Aabis' role in the death.

programme.title: Bronwen Lewis: O'r Stafell Fyw
programme.desc: Cyfle i weld Bronwen yn llwyfannu ei thaith 'Yr Ystafell Fyw' ar lwyfan Canolfan y Celfyddydau Pontardawe. We see Bronwen staging her 'Living Room' tour onstage of Pontardawe Arts Centre.

programme.title: SEICLO: Tour de France 2025
programme.desc: Cymal 2 - Uchafbwyntiau'r dydd o Boulogne-sur-Mer. Stage 2 - The day's highlights from Boulogne-sur-Mer.

programme.title: Radio Fa'ma
programme.desc: Pobol Llanidloes sy'n rhannu eu straeon ac yn agor eu calonnau wrth i Tara Bethan a Kris Hughes yrru carafan 'Radio Fa'ma' i'r dref. The people of Llanidloes share their stories this time.

programme.title: Dylan ar Daith
programme.desc: Hanes David Thompson a fapiodd afon Columbia yn ogystal rhannau helaeth o gyfandir Gogledd America. The story of David Thompson who mapped vast tracts of N. America and the Columbia River.
